title: Things that have happened since Duke Nukem was announced.
Let's rock!
content:
To ask, has there happened anything worth.. happening? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Keen was released before Duke 3D, so I guess there has been nothing..

"Things that have taken less time than Duke Nukem Forever's Development"
Hehe, this was the better section of the two.. The game's better be extremely good! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Let's rock!
content:
Indeed, that second list should be longer.

* The entire Keen series was imagined, programmed, released, patched and abandonded.

* The human genome sequenced, from promises to final release

* East Timor became a seperate country, was invaded by India then left in peace

* Russia developed its H-Bomb

* Keen modding was announced with now over 30 seperate releases and roughly 6'000 individua patches avalible.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Let's rock!
content:
Wow, thats funny. The list is too short, though. Hundreds of thousands of other things have happened since then... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] -Genius314

title: Re: Let's rock!
content:
That list is awesome... LMAO


WWII ended sooner....


I think Duke Nukem Fovever has become the Universe is Toast of the Duke Nukem series.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Let's rock!
content: The difference is that they actually told us that it would be no Universe is Toast

title: Re: Let's rock!
content:

It's cool how they start the list with my favourite game series. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
